title: Bắc Ninh province
summary: Bắc Ninh (listen) is a province of Vietnam, located in the Red River Delta of the northern part of the country. It is the smallest province of Vietnam and is situated to the east of the nation's capital, Hanoi, and borders Bắc Giang province, Hưng Yên province, Hải Dương province and Hanoi. The province covers an area of 822.71 square kilometres and as of 2019 it had a population of 1,368,840.[3] The province's name literally means "northern serenity".
